Relizane is the capital. ==Divisions== The province has 13 districts and 38 communes or municipalities. ===Districts=== # Ain Tarik # Ammi Moussa # Djidiouia # El H'Madna # El Matmar # Mazouna # Mendes # Oued Rhiou # Ramka # Relizane # Sidi M'Hamed Ben Ali # Yellel # Zemmoura ==References== Category:Provinces of Algeria
